description.english: Unlock all platings, glows, and costumes in the Mekapod

description.dutch: Ontgrendel iedere bedekking, gloed en kostuum in de Mekapod

description.norwegian: Lås opp alle platteringer, gløder og kostymer i mekapoden
description.swedish: Lås upp förgyllning, glöd och kostymer i Mekapod
description.hungarian: Szerezz meg minden borítást, izzást és jelmezt a Mekapodban
description.romanian: Deblochează toate tipurile de placaj, luciu şi costume în Mekapod
description.turkish: Mekapod'da tüm kaplamaların, parıltıların ve kostümlerin kilidini aç
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todas as metalizações, brilhos e fantasias no Mekapod
description.greek: Ξεκλείδωσε όλες τις θωρακίσεις, λάμψεις και τα κοστούμια στη Meka-κάψουλα
